title: Best Accommodation Facilities at Lowest Price at Hotel Hayat Rabbani (Naim Rabbani)
text: By Naim Rabbani Aug 7, 2015 Jaipur, also called as the pink city of India is one of the most visited tourist places in India. Having various well known places like hawa mahal, Albert hall museum, jantar mantar etc. Jaipur attracts a lot of tourists who seeks rich cultural heritage of India. At such a high profile destination a proper accommodation with facilities that keep up to the reputation of the place is most wanted. To suffice this need and with sole objective, hotel hayat rabbani has been founded in Jaipur.Our hotel, situated at the station road Jaipur is a tourist accommodation facility. With sole mission to provide up to date and rich services to the people visiting the city. Available at budget that all class of tourists afford, Hotel hayat rabbani aims at delivering services that touches the one who stays at the place. Situated in the vicinity of airport as well as railway station, hotel hayat rabbani is a budget hotel that everyone desires. With accommodation facilities categorized into deluxe, executive and premium, all the categories make sure that the visitors get the best of service possible. The services provided include special lining bed, daily cleaning, phone line and television connection for deluxe rooms, air conditioning and ironing facilities along with above for executive rooms and special premium services like newspapers, wakeup call, attached bathroom etc for the premium rooms.Along with these services and facilities like laundry service, internet service and doctor on call service which is considered as the most important and marks the unique identity of the hotel. Started with a noble vision to reach out to the world standards, hotel hayat rabbani have been able to achieve personalized exceptional service and have exceeded the expectations of the visitors. It has been motivating other brands to get associated with hotel in turn adding stars to its brand value.The budget hotel also provides services like pick up and drop and the much appreciated rooftop restaurant. While the pickup and drop gives the visitors a comfort arrival as well as a satisfying departure from the town, the rooftop restaurant gives the much needed relief. The restaurant provides all the delicacies again at affordable prices tags. The taste has been rated quite impressive by most of the visitors who enjoy the service. The pickup and drop service has also been rated impressively good for its prompt availability while arrival at the station and departure from the city. Hotel Hayat rabbani understands the importance of formal meetings and get together and has employed a staff that is readily available to plan and execute your events successfully. Its state of art lounge gives a space for such events along with the services that are surely remembered for a long time.Hotel hayat provides the accommodation facilities as much affordable prices as possible. Where deluxe rooms are starting at Rs.995, executive rooms at Rs.1195 and premium rooms will cost Rs.1395 only. This makes it the budget hotel in the town with the beat service. The tourists will get special offers in the festive season where a huge price drop can be expected. Working with a firm agenda to meet up and even exceed the guest expectations hotel hayat is marching to achieve great heights in hospitality sector. About the Author Naim Rabbani writes about budget hotels in Jaipur . If you have any queries or suggestions you can drop your message on http://hotelhayatrabbani.com/contact-us.html Rating:
